item.title: A few podcasts I always listen to
item.description: Between commuting by bicycle and working, I listen to a lot of podcasts. I listen to podcasts to learn something new, keep up with the news, and, occasionally, hear other viewpoints. I thought it would be worth sharing a few that I (almost) never miss downloading and listening to, especially those that others may not regularly hear about, are new, or are sort of niche in terms of the audience. For what itâ€™s worth, I use Pocket Casts both on my computer and phone, as it syncs easily between them and has an easy to use interface.
